name: Water Fairies
description: Naiada is water nymph who lives in a village of continuous rain, He likes once saw human activities. But a while , gravity water turning, Water rising to over without some reason. People in the village fear and trouble getting water for their daily. Naiada feel misery of the people in the village. He wanted to find out , what is behind this incident. Naiada do one of them away from the base of the earth toward into the sky to know for of water up.
